page.title: 18DARTINGTON HALL TRUST
page.content: The Dartington Hall Trust was formed to run the activities of Dartington Hall after the deaths of the founders, Leonard and Dorothy Elmhirst.The Trust has acted as a medium of social concern and catalyst for a large number of organisations including a private school,College of Arts,Arts Centre,number of businesses,and farm. For Example,the Cider Press Centre used to be a cider press.Now there are lots of shops.There is a garden centre ,a toy shop,ethnic crafts shop,clothes shop,wholefood restaurant,gift and herbal shop,farm food shop,Dartington glass shop,and Kitchenware.The centre also functions as a craft museum and gallery. The activities of the Trust has made the area a unique place,with a range of facilities far beyond normal for a village of this size.
